website_summaries.verdict: An all-around favorite for indoor soccer and daily wear.
pros: Comes in black with white, white with black
Leather and synthetic upper, textile lining, lace-up closure, EVA insole, die-cut EVA midsole, rubber outsole
cons: Some report dirt gets trapped in logo on sole

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy anything else!
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these for my five year old boy who HATES wearing shoes because they always hurt his feet. I've tried Chucks, Vans, off-brand and finally decided to give the Samba's a try... They are SO easy to get on his foot (I'd literally struggle for 10-15 minutes with shoes going over the heel properly until these) and they stay tied throughout the day. They have also withstood two weeks of Kindergarten boy play and still look new! Not a single complaint from him since he's been wearing these daily. They are true to size and even fit on wider feet and STILL no issues going on. Will definitely be buying again. Great purchase, great value and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TRUST THIS VENDOR -- SHOES ARE NOT LEATHER AND LIKELY FAKES
customer_reviews.text: The best attribute of the adidas Samba is that it is extremely durable. Much of that durability is linked to its 100% leather construction. Of particular note is the suede toe area, which bears the brunt of much soccer-related activity. The shoes that were delivered to me were not leather. They are mostly vinyl, with some sort of odd synthetic material in place of the toe. The supposed-to-be suede toe areas were cut to visibly different sizes on the right and left shoe. Further, the material that was used in place of suede proved to be extremely cheap. The shoe was worn in the rain once, whereupon the fake suede material promptly ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Alice P. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Gambled and won!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to be my son's winter sneakers. Wanted something heavier than a mesh running shoe. They have done a good job, showing little wear after a few months of everyday wear on a five-year-old boy. He says they are "cool" and are comfortable enough that he wears them all day without complaint. He has always had wide feet, so we were glad to find a comfy shoe that we didn't have to order in extra wide. I love that they go with pretty much any outfit. When he outgrows these, we will be buying another pair in the next size up!
customer_reviews.author: lildebbiec

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend - adidas little kids samba classic
customer_reviews.text: adidas little kids samba classic - Like that it fits snugly as it should. My kid has average width feet and wears average thickness sports socks. Do not buy if your kid's feet are even slightly chubby or a "little" wide. For comparison, he wears 10.5 (little kid) Nikes; and these adidas 9.5 (little kids) fit the same. Don't like the rather stiff sole. We've been bending the sole manually with our hands. Might even ask our teen to run over these shoes with the car a few times just to soften them up. Like the black which doesn't show dirt, and little guy gives a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: customer number

customer_reviews.title: Always Adidas 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: We don’t play soccer. Sorry! But this is our second pair of sambas this year. I have an eight-year-old boy who has a wider forefoot. He cannot wear Nikes because they are too narrow so we tried adidas and they work great. They’re more forgiving and last longer. The leather towards the front of the shoe will start to wear but the construction overall is great. Boys are tough on their shoes regardless but the style and durability of the sambas are awesome. Plus they look cool 🤙🏼
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: 90s-2015
customer_reviews.text: Had some of these in the 90s, loved then and love now

customer_reviews.title: Full Leather kid shoes are difficult to find...
customer_reviews.text: Full leather kids shoe that hopefully will hold up. Tired of spending adult shoe prices on kids shoes made of fabric, which does not survive regardless of brand. Remembered wearing indoor soccer shoes as a kid and them never wearing out. So giving them a go. Seems to be holding up, but only have been in use for ~month. If they survive September to December without wearing a hole then will have a winner. This son really likes them
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars for now. Unsure if new or authentic
customer_reviews.text: While the shoe so far fits and has held up as of day 2, the box it came in is very suspect. A shipping label was partially torn off and then cut out. The shoebox package came in a bag(verified by amazon delivery) so the shipping label wasn’t mine. Also the box had been taped shut but that was already cut. Maybe they were only returned but I’ve never seen this. Very strange.
customer_reviews.author: Angliski

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my five year old son - they are a tiny bit big - but I expected that as I bought them knowing that as he's growing a lot at the moment. He loves them. They look fantastic on! You can really dress them up or down. Very impressed with the quality and make of these shoes and hope to report back about their durability also. Right now, I'm thrilled with this purchase and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Treenz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t feel like low tops
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because this looks like a low- top shoe to me, but the back of the heel and the tongue of the shoe bothers my son/ is uncomfortable. He’s obviously had other low top shoes... does not prefer high tops. If you know your kiddo wouldn’t mind the higher points in the front and back/ doesn’t mind high tops, you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: F. L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Tight, Aches, Bruises
customer_reviews.text: While the length of the shoe may be true to size, those reviewers stating that the width is accommodating to wider feet are either outright lying or speaking of another shoe entirely. There is nothing wide about these shoes at all, and they left bruises after only 6 hours of light wear. I comfortably wear a 7.5 in women's, a 6 in (Walmart's) big girls' shoes and a 5.5 in boys'. These may be aesthetically pleasing but they did not pass where it matters most: comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ana A.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for soccer obsessed toddler
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is soccer obsessed and everyday would ask to wear his soccer shoes to pre-school (cleats). Once these arrived his older sister showed him it said "soccer shoes" on the box and he was so happy to be able to wear them during the day. The fit is a little bigger than other shoes he has the same size but seem comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Serrano

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shoe for an active child
customer_reviews.text: These are the PERFECT shoes for my 7 year old. He is EXTREMELY tough on shoes. They're normally dirty and ragged after about a month of him wearing them. But these shoes are up for the challenge. Black so they don't show dirt, plenty sturdy, and still very fashionable. When he grows out of them I'm sure I'll buy another pair just like them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Nyman

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them- and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing these for my very active, soccer-playing 6 year old son! He loves them and wear them all the time, and I feel confident he can run easily in them and yet be comfortable wearing them all day at school. He hesitated at first, being used to his slip-on Vans sneakers, but we tied the laces and he just slips these on as easily! They seem like they will outlast the Vans, as those have been wearing out more quickly as he gets more and more active.
customer_reviews.author: caffeinegirl

customer_reviews.title: Tied in a knot.. Not
customer_reviews.text: Samba classic you are amazing, but but but thee is one negative to this magnificent shoe. The shoe laces are coated in some slippery concoction that makes the laces look cool but work like dog poo. You can throw every sailor, climbing, double, triple, quad knot at these laces and they will slip right out. May I suggest donate these laces to magicians and keep a more traditional soccer lace for the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Eric Grindley

customer_reviews.title: We Love These on Our 2 1/2 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: These Samba Classic soccer shoes fit and wear great on our 2 1/2 year old. They look so cook on our son that I'm pretty sure he runs faster and jumps higher. My husband wants a pair for himself now because of all the complements our son gets on his. The black color is rubbing off on some areas, but if you knew how wide open, jump from anything, active our son is, you would wonder how any shoes last on this wildman! We will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Are these fake? Soles are much darker than usual
customer_reviews.text: I am really hoping these are not fake, as I have seen reviews stating concerns about that. Just got these today for my 11 year old daughter for indoor soccer and the soles are a very dark brown, almost black. As you can see the color difference compared to a pair my husband has. At the moment, I’m thinking about returning these and paying the extra $10 to get them direct from Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: C Raymond

customer_reviews.title: High quality Samba
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes in every size for my son. They’ve been his favorite for the past 5 years. These are the best quality Samba’s I’ve ever seen. They are well made, the sole is a bit darker than what I’m used to seeing but if you put them in a lineup with other Sambas you would agree these are higher quality. I was suprised! (Made in Vietnam, not sure if that has anything to do with it?)
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as they were 20+ years ago for me!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these when I was a kid and couldn't resist buying these for my 5 year old when I was looking for new shoes for him. These are just as durable as they were 20+ years ago! No matter how many puddles he jumps in or mud he drags through or trees he climbs these things keep on trucking and they clean up well to boot. I am even considering buying a new pair for myself to relive the "good ole days"! Great shoes and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Will & Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough for my 5-year old boy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5-year-old after I got tired of buying him new shoes every month. The kid plays hard and can completely destroy a pair of shoes. But not these babies! I had a hunch indoor soccer shoes could stand up to the abuse, and I was right! Many months later these are still completely intact. I did buy new laces, but these have saved me so much money in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son’s favorite shoes for indoor soccer when he can’t wear cleats. Amazon always has the best price on them!! I buy a size bigger than his usual size for a little room to grow into plus room for his regular socks and soccer socks.
customer_reviews.author: MDubs

customer_reviews.title: Good durable kids shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these as his “daily” shoes and he can flat destroy a pair of shoes. These hold up well and one of the few pair of shoes that he will outgrow before they get torn up.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. CrunchyTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are the only shoes my two year old wears. I will repurchase again and again until he moves out and has to buy his own adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Molina

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and made well
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes for my son. It is his fourth pair. The look great with almost anything. He can play for hours in them and they look pretty new long after he has outgrown them. We have handed down all three of his other pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Needed new Indoor shoes fast!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter told us her old indoor soccer shoes didn't fit 2 days before the indoor season started. With not much time to get to the store I decided to just order up the next size from amazon and pray. Well... they fit great and arrived the morning she needed them!
customer_reviews.author: KGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cute shoes for my boy for kindergarten that he could get on easily by himself that weren't cheesy paw patrol Velcro. These are perfect. He can get them on while they're tied so, he doesn't have to worry about tieing them and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: great for indoor soccer or walking shoe to school
customer_reviews.text: After having bought two of these pairs for U10 and U11 girls last winter from a local store, found what I thought were the same pairs on Amazon at cheaper price. Let me say that looks are deceiving. The look of these pairs compared to the local store are same, but the materials used for black leather is different. The ones from Amazon are "hard" leather, which may outlast the "soft" leather. However, my kids preferred the softer version. They have the same performance and durability, so I will strongly recommend these for indoor sports as well as walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Neutralist

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas & they are durable & very cute on him! They have held up so good for all the wear & tear that he puts them through . They still look new! He wears them all the time! Would purchase again :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these sneakers. His prior pair he had to relace contantly. The laces on these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NWNJ

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I like to buy shoes with some room for growth. My 6 year old wears size 1 in all his other shoes/rain boots, no problems. But this soccer shoe size 1 was just way way too big. Other than the size, it was a good looking shoe ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Blue Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes - real rubber - grippy - wear very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7yr old boy who thinks he is a formula one car. These have great grip and take a beating (standard 7yr old boy treatment). They are relatively expensive but if they save a trip to the clinic, paid in full. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Soles are very stiff
customer_reviews.text: These may look good or trendy, but the soles are just too stiff out of the box. We bought these for indoor soccer, but they barely bend. Some other brands of indoor soccer shoes (I found Nikes) have more flexible soles.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Favorites!!!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite shoes!!! Loooove the shoes! So durable & stylish. Wish adidas kept making them.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMidwest98

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer! Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, durable, well made. 3rd pair we have purchased for our growing son. Will likely buy again when he grows out of this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great classic shoes
customer_reviews.text: He has gotten a lot of use out of them and they have held up really well especially in the toe box where most kids rip through shoes. The suede has dulled some on the toes but they still have a ton of life left in them. They fit his feet well and he says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Fits normal and wide sizes!
customer_reviews.text: My son is nearly impossible to find shoes that fit comfortable. He usually wears a wide which isn't carried in most stores but I took a chance and ordered these in regular width and was able to adjust them. He wears them everyday and loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly King

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: They are as seen in picture Cute Sturdy and strong material
customer_reviews.author: Yulonda Clark

customer_reviews.title: Classic for a reason!
customer_reviews.text: I am an ER nurse and these are one of the only shoes I can wear without my feet hurting at the end of a 12 hour day. I have chosen the same sneakers for over 15 years, and I keep coming back because they hold up well day in and day out for any activity...not just soccer! I can usually get 2 years out of a pair of these, and I wear them hard. Well worth the price, best indoor shoe you can buy. Best sneaker you can buy! A classic for a reason!!
customer_reviews.author: Melphis James

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! This is the fourth pair my kids have had. We love them for everyday shoes and to play soccer in. They look and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: soccermom2

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for kids
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoe great for everyday use looks like it will last long anough
customer_reviews.author: moses

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Classic. Stay clean looking with little kids. Staple in boys shoe lineup
customer_reviews.author: JGolde

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I think these shoes may have not been Authentic. The sizing was way off. We returned them and went to the store and bought them, the same size in store fit perfectly. Dont waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.author: GraySky Matters

customer_reviews.title: Classic, well made, durable and just like dad's!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes-durable and well made. My husband used to wear these all the time, and I thought my boys might like having shoes just like daddy. I was right they were a huge hit and they suited my criteria of being durable and well made, able to last longer than a week for very active boys. Our boys are so hard on their shoes, yet at this point when they are growing so quickly I strongly feel that they should be growing out of shoes before the are wearing out shoes we are paying decent money for. Our boys are 10, 8, and 5 and I plan on buying these shoes again when they outgrow them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: My son AND husband both have a pair of these ...
customer_reviews.text: My son AND husband both have a pair of these. My son is in his second pair since he outgrew his last pair. He loves these shoes. His last pair held up really well considering how hard he plays in them. My husband had a pair as a kid and decided he wanted another pair as an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look good, but they are not intended for play/running
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look good, but they are not intended for play/running. The inside lacks padding and my 8-year old son complained about the heat (i.e. they are not breathable). I'm now ordering different shoes for actual play.
customer_reviews.author: TAM

customer_reviews.title: Most durable shoes
customer_reviews.text: For our soccer playing son, these are the only shoes I buy because he cannot wear out the tops with a soccer ball. Timeless and cool. Moderate arch support. True to size. Best shoes ever.
customer_reviews.author: GKC

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: If your are looking for a great looking shoe for a child that holds up. This is the one great style and easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for active boys!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a staple in our house. My boy loves them. He goes everywhere in them. As an added bonus they seem to be nearly indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Meltzer

customer_reviews.title: So in love!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this style and they look so cute on my 4 year old feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rees

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, weird size
customer_reviews.text: They look great! But I am a women's 5.5, got a 3.5 and it's just not right. The right is big, the left is small. I do think I have dfferent sized feet but usually it's not so pronounced. I'm keeping these bc I had several pairs as a kid and I remember they broke in a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jenmcc

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: They were for my nephew. I wish I knew how tall he was, but I would say around 3'8"(?) He is wearing 1's in all of his other shoes and he said these fit perfectly and they are comfortable. Shipping was fast and they were packaged as expected. Nothing damaged, shoes looked and smelled new
customer_reviews.author: Phantom4627

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes so far. 4 year old had no problems. Other 6 year old son had the diadoras (bought on amazon) and I felt like these held up better. Shoe laces could be 1 inch longer for the double knot but that's just being picky
customer_reviews.author: xroosterx

customer_reviews.title: Timeless shoe
customer_reviews.text: These have been around for so long for a reason. They are a great sure no matter your age or size!
customer_reviews.author: Dogwalker in The City

customer_reviews.title: Soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: Soccer practice, a little tighter than regular 12.5 on my child so definitely consider going one size up specially if the soccer socks are thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Segura

customer_reviews.title: Flat wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My 10y/o has flinstone feet. These are super comfy for him and keep him out of Crocs. He can wiggle his toes and run with ease now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Canon

customer_reviews.title: Very durable for kids. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: If your kids tear through shoes like mine, buy these shoes. These are super durable and easily worth the price
customer_reviews.author: drfrumpy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are the best men’s shoes for kids I’ve ever owned they were less years even when your kid outgrows them because they just keep moving to their feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Long

customer_reviews.title: I feel a little guilty
customer_reviews.text: I must say I feel a little guilty spending this for a 4 year old's pair of soccer shoes. That being said, my son loves them, the quality is great, and they arrived quick which is good because I procrastinated. I got them a little big so they should last a bit assuming no growth spurts (fingers crossed). I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Thomasson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money,  GARBAGE after less than 50 wears.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 6 year old for Christmas thinking they had classic style and QUALITY given the leather and higher price. SADLY they did not last even 3 months of every other day wear... probably less as its been winter here in Wisconsin so the kids wear boots a lot. Wasted money. Back to buying cheap sneakers... they actually last longer!!
customer_reviews.author: MTB@ddict

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are very comfortable. They are beautifully designed and of great quality. I have a pair myself and love them which is why I purchased for my 3 yr. old grandson for winter. Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Miles Graves

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: only shoe I have found that lasted more than one month with my 9 year son. going on two and a half months now and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great durable indoor soccer shoes - just wish they'd be a bit ligher (not as heavy)
customer_reviews.text: They feel very solid, I just wish they'd be a bit lighter. That's the only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars. Other than that - they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: These are just too cute. Grew out of his first pair so we bought a second we loved them so much!
customer_reviews.author: SnowRose

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It's a good shoe it is a little big for my son but he can grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonicblast

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these for my boys. They are pretty Sturdy, they arrived on time and its been 4mo and they are still holding up!
customer_reviews.author: Josce

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these. Great fit and they have lasted! Will probably be saved for little brother too!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: my son's favorite shoe style
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son (age 10, big kid size 5.5). It fit as expected. He has not complained about fit or comfort and wears them every day all day to school (he is NOT shy about letting me know if a shoe bothers him). These are always his favorite shoe and not the first time he has worn adidas Samba's. Would recommend and definitely definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mama M

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Great quality. It takes a whole lot for my son to wear them out. They are too small now after wearing them for a long time, but he still prefers to wear them over his new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I love the shoe is it with stands my kids. What I mean is that my kids have always been rough with their shoes and this brand is great quaility and can handle how active my kids are throughout the year. I will continue to buy sambas for my kids as they grow. Wonderful shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amada Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t true to fit, little big, which is a good thing since my son will grow and the shoe will last.
customer_reviews.author: alejandro soto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe, great price
customer_reviews.text: Same as the adult Samba, stylish leather shoes for my little soccer player. He wears them casually for school and soccer at rec time.
customer_reviews.author: Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Always able to get brand names at resonable prices.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Adidas samba's that I got for my ten year-old daughter they are a x-mas gift that I bought to go with a coat that I also got for her. Now I just have to find shoes for my niece and my nephew. The shoes got here in two days and the delivery service was truely diligent in thier duties the seller them selves are always offering great deals and this is the second pair of shoes that I have purchased this year from them and I plan to shop with them more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zelos Polk

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe and comfortable according to my son. He’s happy with them. They do however run big. Something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Militello

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of Samba's and purchased a pair for my son. Fit perfect, great for an energetic active young boy. He's only worn them for a week and they are still breaking in a little, but he says they're is favorite shoes ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mac

customer_reviews.title: My go to sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Hardly a break in period at all and I’m always getting compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lady L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 9 year old!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter will use these to play indoor soccer and she can't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Delia and Paul Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these shoes! They’re sporty enough to wear with athletic clothes, but still nice enough to wear with nicer outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Denten

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have purchased for my 7 year old son. He learned to tie his shoes laces with these shoes too. They have been awesome he plays soccer and loves to wear these on a day to day basis. I highly recommend this product. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: BEST SOCCER SHOE EVER!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If it aint broke, don't fix it. Adidas has never needed to change this classic. Great fit. Great feel.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wotherspoon

customer_reviews.title: Choosing shoe sizes :-(
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to see more clarity with the shoe sizes at check out. Maybe include the same information that’s on the size chart in each box at check out. It’s too easy to order the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing to wear right now!
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes are perfect. They look good with sweats, jeans; I even wore them with a denim skirt! They are comfortable and just right for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted a pair of these shoes. Hoping they hold up for a 6yo. They fit perfectly and are well made
customer_reviews.author: zilla

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for my little guy
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my 5 year- seem great for indoor soccer and general wear- first day he wore them he said they didn’t hurt his feet. Seem very durable. I was relieved they are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. However, after having them for the past 2 months, I have one issue with them that is very frustrating. The back of the shoe that goes over the heel (white bit) colapses into itself and is VERY difficult to pull out. Other than that, the shoes are holding up great and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: don't recommend it very bad quality one use and look what happened!
customer_reviews.text: No lo recomiendo!!!! Muy mala calidad... don't recommend it very bad quality one use and look what happened!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gutierrez D.

customer_reviews.title: Old classics
customer_reviews.text: Old classics. My 5 year old soccer “star” would wear these to bed if I let him! He says they make him “super fast”!!!
customer_reviews.author: EGOG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and durability.
customer_reviews.text: Best indoor soccer shoes ever! Great quality and timeless design. I bought a pair for my 7 year old and I have been using them for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: NE Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new soccer shoes. They are a nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: AUDITORKIM

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these, I got a pair forceach of them. We always get "They are sooo cut, nice shoes" props when we go out.
customer_reviews.author: Issa Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Good shows but pricey
customer_reviews.text: The fit is just right, I wish kids shows weren't so costly considering every few months kids grow. I like the job skid sole
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Super cool shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this purchase! They arrived quickly, packaged well and our son loves them! The shoes are sturdy and we anticipate they will hold up well. They are definitley wicked cool shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Farm Wife & Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: My son has now had about 4 pairs of these now. All other sneakers he just seems to blow right threw! These are the only shoes that hold up between school, playing outside and indoor soccer. Sit his feet perfect too. Absolutely love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Battle TANKS on your feet
customer_reviews.text: These are a really heavy duty pair of sneakers. My son (9 years old) use them to school and beside that do some soccer with them. They last the entire year. If you want a durable sporty and traditional soccer sneakers these are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Boy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable school shoe. My son is picky when it comes to footwear and these work great
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: for my son; classic look; he seems to like them. Wears them for indoor also.
customer_reviews.author: Corey F

customer_reviews.title: Look great and are holding up well
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are holding up well. My son has wide feet and these work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sneakers. I bought these for my 7 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sneakers. I bought these for my 7 year old who plays indoor soccer on a basketball court. They can be worn as cool street sneakers after the season which makes them worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: The best for kids
customer_reviews.text: They were meant to be for football and after a year of wearing them every day they are still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Marce Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Kids didn't like the fit.
customer_reviews.text: My kids didn't really like the fit of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: what's not to love!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He wore his last pair until they were too small. They have held up very well. With Amazon, the price is right, returns for these shoes are free if needed, and the Samba is a classic shoe...what's not to love!
customer_reviews.author: J Walker

product_meta.title: adidas Kids' Samba Classic Boots Soccer Shoe
product_meta.description:
Getting up and down the field with speed is the name of the indoor game. The Samba has dominated indoor football for decades for a reason. This juniors' version of the legendary football boots features a leather upper and a lightweight EVA midsole for better response on indoor surfaces.

adidas is a name that stands for excellence in all sectors of sport around the globe. The vision of company founder Adolf Dazzler has become a reality, and his corporate philosophy has been the guiding principle for successor generations. The idea was as
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Boot opening measures approximately 0-3 inches around
Die-cut EVA insole for lightweight comfort
Non-marking gum rubber outsole for excellent grip on all indoor surfaces
